Best, MFA

These storms are unpredictable, slow moving and our area sits right on the line for snow or rain. I will make a call about tomorrow before 6 AM...after consultation with colleagues, reviewing the most recent weather data and discussing with our buildings and grounds department. Please be prepared for a variety of options...to delay, dismiss early or close... depending upon the weather. As always, safety is our first and primary concern.

Best, MFA
